metering: Yes, Multi-segment metering(AiAE), Spot metering, Center-weighted metering
operatingsystem: Windows XP(SP3), Vista, 7 and 8, Mac : OS X 10.4 or more recent
whitebalancing: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Fluorescent, Fluorescent CWF, Incandescent,  Manual WB
flashmodes: Force Off, Flash Auto, Force Flash, Slow Synchro, Slow Synchro+Red Eye, Red-Eye Reduction
autofocus: Yes, TTL contrast detection auto focus system, Single, Multi, Continuous, AF Assist
imageformat: JPEG ( Fine, Best & Normal Quality Level )
facedetection: Yes, Face detection: Face Detection AF&AE is available up to 12 faces
shootingmodes: Manual, Auto, Portrait, Movie, Panorama, SCN(Auto Scene,  Landscape, Sport, Beach, Sunset, Fireworks, Night Landscape, Snow, Children, ID, Glass, Photo Frame, Panning Shot, Sketch, Fish Eye, Party, Indoor, Leaf, Museum, Night Portrait)
